questions.question: What are the two isoreticular fluorinated metal-organic frameworks (MOFs) reported in the study?
What unique structural feature do JXNU-11(Fe2Ni) and JXNU-11(Fe2Co) MOFs have?
What is the primary application focus of JXNU-11(Fe2Ni) and JXNU-11(Fe2Co) MOFs?
How do JXNU-11(Fe2Ni) and JXNU-11(Fe2Co) MOFs achieve high-performance C2H2/CO2 separation?
questions.answer: Through their nanosized double-shell cages decorated with abundant fluorine and carboxylate oxygen atoms

questions.question: What is the C2H2 breakthrough time for JXNU-11(Fe2Ni) in the breakthrough experiment?
What makes the pore surfaces of JXNU-11(Fe2Ni) and JXNU-11(Fe2Co) MOFs highly polarized and fluorophilic?
questions.answer: The presence of highly electronegative fluorine and carboxylate oxygen atoms

questions.question: True or False: JXNU-11(Fe2Ni) and JXNU-11(Fe2Co) MOFs have the highest C2H2-capture amount observed at ambient condition.
What is the role of fluorine atoms in the separation process of C2H2/CO2 in JXNU-11(Fe2Ni) and JXNU-11(Fe2Co) MOFs?
questions.answer: Fluorine atoms act as preferential binding sites for the acidic hydrogen atoms of C2H2, facilitating its separation from CO2

questions.question: True or False: The C2H2/CO2 separation efficiency of JXNU-11(Fe2Ni) and JXNU-11(Fe2Co) MOFs decreases significantly after multiple cycles of adsorption/desorption.
What experimental technique was used to confirm the phase purity of the bulk samples of JXNU-11(Fe2Ni) and JXNU-11(Fe2Co)?
True or False: The primary binding sites for C2H2 in JXNU-11(Fe2Ni) and JXNU-11(Fe2Co) MOFs are the open metal sites.
What is the main reason for the high C2H2 adsorption capacity of JXNU-11(Fe2Ni) and JXNU-11(Fe2Co) MOFs at 273 K?
questions.answer: The polarized and fluorophilic microporous environments of the MOFs

questions.question: True or False: The breakthrough experiments for JXNU-11(Fe2Ni) and JXNU-11(Fe2Co) MOFs were performed at room temperature.
What computational simulation was performed to investigate the gas adsorption sites for JXNU-11(Fe2Ni) and JXNU-11(Fe2Co) MOFs?
True or False: The C2H2 breakthrough times for JXNU-11(Fe2Ni) and JXNU-11(Fe2Co) MOFs are among the shortest observed for MOFs.
What is the effect of temperature on the C2H2 breakthrough times for JXNU-11(Fe2Ni) in the breakthrough experiments?
questions.answer: The C2H2 breakthrough times increase significantly with a decrease in temperature

questions.question: True or False: The C2H2 captured amounts during the breakthrough experiments for JXNU-11(Fe2Ni) and JXNU-11(Fe2Co) MOFs are lower than those of other prominent MOFs.
What is the main advantage of the modest adsorption heat of C2H2 for JXNU-11(Fe2Ni) and JXNU-11(Fe2Co) MOFs?
questions.answer: It allows for easy regeneration of the MOFs through purging the column with He gas at ambient temperature

questions.question: True or False: The desorption experiments for JXNU-11(Fe2Ni) showed that CO2 molecules were released from the adsorption bed more slowly than C2H2 molecules.
What is the productivity of C2H2 with over 95% purity estimated from the desorption curve for 1 g of JXNU-11(Fe2Ni)?
